Topic.Title: Need help with using the web player

Posts.EditableText:
Hi I need help with playing a game using the web player on my Iphone using voiceover
Is there a way to make the web player automaticly read the out put text as I enter a command
For example when I type open east door I have to swipe left until I get to where it says you open the east door
What I want it to do is when I type open east door and hit enter I want it to automaticly say you open the east door without me having to swipe left to find that respaunce
I am sorry in advance if this is the wrong place to put this but I just got back into this sight and didn't know where to put it
Thank you for any help you can give me

Posts.EditableText: I know nothing about voice over software but confused as to why you'd need to swipe left to get a response. There's no swiping involved in Quest, just clicking links or typing in commands. Besides that, mobile isn't the best platform for it really. Computers are better.
